name: Base64 Payload Detection
description: Detects Base64-encoded text that may contain malicious instructions. Attackers use encoding to bypass simple keyword filters. While not all Base64 is malicious, unusually long encoded strings warrant inspection.
author: forensicate-team
falsePositives: Here is a Base64-encoded image: data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KG...
The API key is stored as Base64
